scripts.postinstall: cd apps/mobile && yarn install && cd ../.. && cd services && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.install-workspaces: cd apps/mobile && yarn install && cd ../.. && cd services && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.clean: yarn cache clean && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && find apps -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find services -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find packages -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name '.expo' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name '.next' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null
scripts.dev:services: cd services && yarn sls offline --stage dev
scripts.test: yarn test:mobile && yarn test:services && yarn test:packages
scripts.build: yarn build:packages && yarn build:apps && yarn build:services
scripts.infra:deploy-dev: cd infrastructure && yarn cdk deploy --context environment=development
